content: version but work the first 5 /13cm in garter stitch and then continue in stockinette note this version may use slightly more yarn which means that one skein might not be enough using two yarns you can also work the cuff with a textured yarn and then work the top section using a smoother yarn maybe bulky or aran weight held double - see photo on the left to do this switch yarns after approx 5 /13cm lara s hat with her hashtag snowflake cowl © susan ashcroft 2014 - for personal non-commercial use only
